LanguageData.RawShimmershroom.label: 시모르스 버섯
LanguageData.RawShimmershroom.description: Raw shimmershroom. Its delicate taste and nutrition qualities are much appreciated by caveworlds inhabitants.
LanguageData.RawGlowbulb.label: 광초
LanguageData.RawGlowbulb.description: Raw glowbulb. While being nutritious, its very rough taste craft it better used as a cooked ingredient.
LanguageData.GleamcapStem.label: 크림 버섯
LanguageData.GleamcapStem.description: A massive 크림 버섯. Known for its natural healing properties by caveworld tenders, it can be used to treat injuries and ease the pain.
LanguageData.RawGiantLeaf.label: 거대한 잎사귀
LanguageData.RawGiantLeaf.description: Raw 거대한 잎사귀. Not really appetizing raw, it is better prepared as a soup.
